author: Discovery
description:
Officers find drugs and guns hidden in sneaky spots like sea salt bags, foil-wrapped packages, coolers, and kids’ toys. Each bust shows how far people will go to sneak contraband across the border.

Stream Full Episodes of Contraband: Seized at the Border
https://www.discoveryplus.com/show/contraband-seized-at-the-border-us

#Discovery #ContrabandSeizedattheBorder

About Contraband: Seized at the Border
The border between the USA and Mexico is the busiest in the world. This series follows the work of America's Customs and Border Protection agency, whose job is to defend the border and stop terrorists, drugs and illegal weapons from entering the country.
